names.english: quicken the blood and stimulate menstruation dercoction
names.commonEnglish: Quicken the Blood and Stimulate Menstruation Decoction

actions: Tonifies, invigorates and harmonizes the Blood.
Tonifies the Liver and Kidneys, nourishes the Blood and nourishes Jing.
Invigorates the Blood, dispels Stasis, clears Heat and resolves toxicity.
With Dang Gui, for Blood Stasis with infertility, irregular menstruation, lower abdominal pain and fullness, and scanty menstruation.
Invigorates the Blood, expels Blood Stasis and nourishes Liver and Kidney Yin.
Nourishes and tonifies Liver and Kidney Blood and Yin and benefits Jing.
Invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis and alleviates pain.

symptoms: Stabbing pain in the low back, feet, testes, penis and lower abdomen
Occasional swelling of penis and testes aggravated by resting and sleeping and better with movement
Itch or pain of hairy areas
High viscosity sperm with a high number of deformed sperm and abnormal sperm count
